Minecraft Details

Quick Facts

  • Release Date: November 18, 2011
  • Developer: Mojang Studios
  • Publisher: Mojang Studios
  • Platforms: PC, Mobile, Console
  • Genre: Sandbox, Survival
  • Price: £24.99

Game Description

Minecraft is a sandbox game that allows players to build with a variety of different blocks in a 3D procedurally generated world. The game features multiple modes including survival mode, where players must acquire resources and maintain their health, and creative mode, where players have unlimited resources and the ability to fly.

Key Features

  • Infinite worlds to explore and build in
  • Multiple game modes (Survival, Creative, Adventure, Spectator)
  • Multiplayer support for playing with friends
  • Regular updates with new content and features
  • Cross-platform play between different devices
  • Extensive modding community and custom content

Game Modes

Survival Mode

Gather resources, craft tools, build shelters, and survive against hostile mobs.

Creative Mode

Unlimited resources and flying ability for unrestricted building and creation.

Adventure Mode

Explore custom maps and adventures created by other players.
